info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire County through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cheshire, or near Pittsfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, North Adams, Adams, Cheshire, Florida, Savoy, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Hinsdale, Windsor, Peru, Soldiers Memorial Field, Cheshire Harbor, Arnoldville, Town Crest Village, Lakeview Terrace, Maple Grove, Eastern Summit and The Boulders. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
